functions.name: Ln
functions.description: Computes the natural logarithm of a number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to compute the natural logarithm for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a number.

functions.name: LnTable
functions.description: Computes the natural logarithm values of each item in the input table.

parameters.name: E
parameters.description: The table of numbers to compute the natural logarithm for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a table.
